name: Dang! Wdibastaza?
description:
WASD move/shoot; R  restart.
Hint: The difficult increases as you change rooms.

Good Luck!

Obs: the theme is included when your character die, since he transforms into a ghost and lets you play more freely.

Zombies specialties:

Default: #1 boring in the apocalyptic world.
Golem: Turns into a Default when first shooted.
Leg-day: Jumps 2 tiles every turn.
Zombat: Flies trough walls, but runs away if another bat is killed.
Shooter: Gives candy for you <3 (just kidding, he shoots).

Let me know your thoughts and best score in the comments!
